DOC.brief_summary: Study to obtain long-term data on effects, safety and tolerability in routine medical practice and to investigate the potential of telmisartan to prevent secondary organ damage
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study in Rehabilitation Clinics (Cardio, Nephro, Diabetes, Pulmo)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of both gender aged >=18 admitted to a hospital due to insufficiently controlled essential hypertension. No additional selection criteria have to be considered. Treatment was at the discretion of the physician following the summary of product information for Micardis® and MicardisPlus®
